unnormalised: IIT Delhiâ€™s cutoffs for the 2024 JEE Advanced exams were apparently so high, even Einstein would've needed coaching! Sources say that securing a seat in Computer Science required a rank under 100. Looks like scoring 99.9 percentile in JEE Main wasn't enough, beta!
normalised: I-I-T Delhi's cutoffs for the two thousand and twenty four J-E-E Advanced exams were apparently so high, even Einstein would've needed coaching! Sources say that securing a seat in Computer Science required a rank under one hundred. Looks like scoring ninety nine point nine percentile in J-E-E Main wasn't enough, beta!

unnormalised: Rumours are circulating that a student tried bribing the admission committee with 1 kg of laddoos. Apparently, Prof. Sharma just laughed and told him to try again next year with 2 kg. Even Ambani's kid would sweat applying to these courses!
normalised: Rumours are circulating that a student tried bribing the admission committee with one kilogram of laddoos. Apparently, Professor Sharma just laughed and told him to try again next year with two kilogram. Even Ambani's kid would sweat applying to these courses!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, DU colleges are facing the opposite problem. Turns out, the FYUP messed things up so much that admissions are lower than expected. Looks like everyone prepone their plans to study abroad. Who needs a degree when you can become an influencer, right?
normalised: Meanwhile, D-U colleges are facing the opposite problem. Turns out, the F-Y-U-P messed things up so much that admissions are lower than expected. Looks like everyone prepone their plans to study abroad. Who needs a degree when you can become an influencer, right?
